title: I have tried multiple cables and but Pixel 3XL only charges with a wireless charger. Please help!
content:
My phone no longer chargers using any cable. When I put the cable in, it comes up with a notification about Android System as it either thinks I have put in headphones or it thinks I have USB debugging connected.

It wireless charges, but as you can imagine it is very very slow.

Please help!
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
